price: 48. Waxaa la yidhi Nuuxow! Ku deg Nabad galyo Xaggayaga ah iyo barakooyin korkaaga iyo korkooda ummado ka mid ah kuwa kula jira (waa mu'miniinta, waxaase jiri doona) ummado (kale oo gaalo ah) aan u raaxeyn (in xoogaa muddo ah), kaddib waxaa ka taaban doona Xaggayaga cadaab xanuun badan (Aakhirada).
arabic: قِيلَ يَٰنُوحُ ٱهۡبِطۡ بِسَلَٰمٖ مِّنَّا وَبَرَكَٰتٍ عَلَيۡكَ وَعَلَىٰٓ أُمَمٖ مِّمَّن مَّعَكَۚ وَأُمَمٞ سَنُمَتِّعُهُمۡ ثُمَّ يَمَسُّهُم مِّنَّا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qīla yānūḥu ih'biṭ bisalāmin minnā wabarakātin ʿalayka waʿalā umamin mimman maʿaka wa-umamun sanumattiʿuhum thumma yamassuhum minnā ʿadhābun alīmun
